齚字的基本解释

齚
zé
古同“齰”，啃，咬：“饿犬齚枯骨。”

齚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zé］
［《廣韻》鋤陌切，入陌，崇。］
啮。
[②]［zhà］
见“齚2齖”。

齚字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齚； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1533第09
【唐韻】側革切，音賾。【說文】齧也。【史記·灌夫傳】魏其必內愧，杜門齚舌自殺。　又【廣韻】鋤陌切【集韻】實窄切，?音咋。又【集韻】側格切，音迮。義?同。

齚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
齚字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Juan
zé
Gu Tong "齰", gnaw, bite: "The hungry dog has withered bones."
Juan

Bite.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Teeth Department] 　齚; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1533 Page 09
[Tang Yun] The side leather is cut, and the sound is round. [Said the text] bite too. [Historical Records · Guan Fu Biography] Wei Qi must be ashamed, Du Menjun committed suicide with tongue.　[Guangyun] Hoe Mochi [Jiyun] is really narrow and cut,? Sounds. Also 【Jiyun】The side grid is cut, and the sound is deep. Righteous? Same.
